Reminiscent Assault.name: Reminiscent Assault
Reminiscent Assault.fullText:
Twiceborn Leader Attack 11Reminiscent Assault

You attack in the name of Jarret, taking the action to new heights if you strike your enemy down.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is an aberrant creature, you and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you or one ally within 10 squares of you can make a basic attack as a free action.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 129.
Reminiscent Assault.flavor: You attack in the name of Jarret, taking the action to new heights if you strike your enemy down.
Reminiscent Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is an aberrant creature, you and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you or one ally within 10 squares of you can make a basic attack as a free action.

Twinning Ploy.name: Twinning Ploy
Twinning Ploy.fullText:
Twiceborn Leader Utility 12Twinning Ploy

You and a chosen ally engage in a complex maneuver that distracts your enemies enough to assure the success of your attacks.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. Both you and the ally, on your own turns, can roll an extra d20 and choose the higher result for one attack roll each turn. Until the stance ends, this effect applies only when you are both conscious and within 5 squares of each other.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 129.
Twinning Ploy.flavor: You and a chosen ally engage in a complex maneuver that distracts your enemies enough to assure the success of your attacks.
Twinning Ploy.effect: Choose an ally within 5 squares of you. Both you and the ally, on your own turns, can roll an extra d20 and choose the higher result for one attack roll each turn. Until the stance ends, this effect applies only when you are both conscious and within 5 squares of each other.

Seconded Smite.name: Seconded Smite
Seconded Smite.fullText:
Twiceborn Leader Attack 20Seconded Smite

When the going is rough, you are at your best, allowing an ally to mirror your ruinous attack.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of conscious allies within 10 squares of you who have already used second wind during this encounter (maximum bonus of +4).

Hit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: One ally within 10 squares of you who has already used second wind during this encounter can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and then make a melee basic attack as a free action.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 129.
Seconded Smite.flavor: When the going is rough, you are at your best, allowing an ally to mirror your ruinous attack.
Seconded Smite.attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of conscious allies within 10 squares of you who have already used second wind during this encounter (maximum bonus of +4).
Seconded Smite.effect: One ally within 10 squares of you who has already used second wind during this encounter can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and then make a melee basic attack as a free action.
